justification: Acknowledges Team B’s taste for dual-threat QBs but ignores that B already has a Tier 2 QB and urgently needs TE/WR help, not an Out RB. Team A is injury-averse yet seeks an Out TE and claims a TE hole despite rostering a Tier 1 TE. Rationale is brief and generic, with little nuance about each side’s incentives or constraints. Trade logic is inconsistent with profiles and roster needs.
